description: This file defines a UI component named 'Results' for a quiz application, built using LightningJS framework. It manages presentation and user interaction for displaying quiz results, including score display and restart functionality.

classes.name: Results
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the Results page of the quiz app, displaying scores and restart options.

methods.name: getButtonEffects
methods.description: Returns shader effects for the restart button, avoiding inline object literals for precompiler safety.

methods.name: getButtonColor
methods.description: Determines the button color based on focus state.

methods.name: getButtonTextColor
methods.description: Determines the text color of the restart button based on focus state.
